Description: HohnerRockwoodLP-CopyGloss Ebony FinishElectric GuitarUsed - Very Good Condition Sporting a slightly thinner body than a standard LP, this Hohner Rockwood still has the charm and tone that will convince you that it's the real deal. This Rockwood LP-copy is decked out in a classic ebony finish, cream binding around top and fretboard, and chrome hardware, too. The extremely high price associated with the real deal LP is the one thing you'll definitely notice missing from this sweet sounding Hohner! Cosmetic and Functionality DescriptionBody: the top, back, and sides show some obvious surface scratches and scuff marks as well as some small to medium-sized dings and indentations--moderate amount of buckle rash; a few small chips in the finish, not the wood or binding, can be found around the edges of the body; the pickguard and the electronics cover have some small scuff marks and scratches from typical use Neck, Fretboard, and Headstock: the fretboard looks almost flawless except for a couple of extremely super small dings that can only really be seen upon very close inspection; the back of the neck has a few very light surface scratches on the lacquer that are really only noticeable upon close inspection, plus there are a few small dings, one at the 1st fret position and two at the 5th fret position, that are noticeable to the touch but should not affect comfort or playability; the headstock has some very light surface scratches and tiny nicks that can be found on the front and back, plus the very end edge has some scuff marks and tiny nicks in the finish--light scratches can be seen on the truss rod cover Action and Playability: the action is about medium, plus the neck is straight and the truss rod functions flawlessly Frets: light wear Hardware: all looks great except the pickup covers have some light scratches on them and the bridge pickup cover has a small dent under the high E-string Electronics: all functions flawlessly Includes: electric guitar (pickguard, case, and gig bag are not included) Features 3-piece bound top5-piece body Gloss ebony finish Bolt-on neck Slim neck profile Rosewood fretboard 22 frets Pearl trapezoid inlays Chrome tuners and hardware Tune-O-Matic bridge and stopbar 2 x humbuckers 2 x volume knobs and 2 x tone knobs 3-way selector switchBody thickness: 1-3/4" Scale: 25" Nut Width: 1-11/16" Weight: 8 lbs. 2 oz.
